text:
We still have some time before the next meeting...
Want to kill time at a café?

Hehe, that sounds lovely, but...
If it's okay, could we go into a bookstore?

Of course, no problem.
What do you want to see?

I want to look at costume design sketches...
I'm feeling a bit fired up about it.

I want to make accessories that match the costumes...
Like pouches or plushies.

So I want to know about current color schemes and
accessory motifs... I just want to be informed!
Ah, I see, that's what it's about...

...It sounds nice, being able to create those things
yourself. Seems fun.

Yes, it's fun♪
Just being surrounded by favorites makes me happy...

Having merchandise based on beloved costumes, having them
in tangible form nearby... It feels like a little miracle!
